__e: Every scientist, engineer, and general is trying to figure out a way to put a man on the moon or blow up Moscow, whichever one costs more.
A woman is waiting for me in Moscow in an empty apartment. The woman I love.
~ Where do you think you are, in Moscow, in Paris?
- Now there'll be hell to pay in Moscow.
We have evidence that he's in Moscow.
He might be in Moscow already...
It could strike Moscow and people there would immediately die.
I must go back to Moscow and speak with her.
- We go to Moscow, you go home. - I can't.
I was surprised to see you in Moscow.
I'm very moved to be once again in Moscow.
Well, it's hard to live in Moscow.
